resources.string: Selection Sort\n\nIn this algorithm every time minimum element is selected from unsorted part and swaps with the leftmost element of unsorted part
Bubble Sort\n\nIn this algorithm we scan array n-1 times and at every scan we check every adjacent element, if current element is greater than its adjacent element than we swaps both
Insertion Sort\n\nIn this algorithm we divide array into 2 parts sorted and unsorted, every time we a pick element from unsorted part and insert it in its appropriate position in sorted part
Merge Sort\n\nIn this algorithm we recursively divide array into 2 parts now we sort each individual part and than merge them to original array
Heap Sort\n\nIn this algorithm every time we find maximum element using heap data structure and swap it with last element of unsorted part
